title: HotspotGeometryConfig
description: An instance of a hotspot geometry configuration.

type.title: Type
type.description:
The type of geometry to create. There are all derivate of THREE.JS geometries. Available values are :
  • plane for PlaneBufferGeometry
  • box for BoxBufferGeometry
  • sphere for SphereBufferGeometry
  • cylinder for CylinderBufferGeometry
  • shape for ShapeBufferGeometry

options.title: Options
options.description: The options of the geometry, specific and different for each geometry. See the list of available geometry above and their list of parameters.
